comments:
When the user enters '%' into the project name, '_' is correctly substituted 
into the plugin id.  But when the user clicks finish, an 
IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

Also, if the user selects to create a Manifest, they only get this one 
exception.  If they do not create a Manifest in the wizard, there are 3 or 4 
other exceptions that are thrown.

Created an attachment (id=37565)
patch

Due to bug 3109, the runtime has put in its readme that it does not support % in a plugin location.  Therefore, have added logic to prevent plug-in project from having % in their parent folders or in the project name.
